author: Albert Einstein
quote: A new idea comes suddenly and in a rather intuitive way. But intuition is nothing but the outcome of earlier intellectual experience.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones.

author: Kate Bush
quote: As an artist, you're never happy with anything you do. It's part of the process.

author: Cyrano de Bergerac
quote: Most men judge only by their senses and let themselves be persuaded by what they see

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Without 'ethical culture' there is no salvation for humanity

author: Cyrano de Bergerac
quote: I think the Moon is a world like this one, and the Earth is its moon.

author: Yehuda Bauer
quote: Thou shall not be a perpetrator, thou shall not be a victim, and thou shall never, but never, be a bystander.

author: Clint Eastwood
quote: I thought I might die. But then I thought, 'Other people have made it through these things before'. I kept my eyes on the lights on shore and kept swimming.

author: Masanobu Fukuoka
quote: The ultimate goal of farming is not the growing of crops, but the cultivation and perfection of human beings.

author: Luigi Pirandello
quote: Anyone can be heroic from time to time, but a gentleman is something which you have to be all the time. Which isn't easy.

author: Peace Pilgrim
quote: I deal with spiritual truth which should never be sold and need never be bought. When you are ready it will be given.

author: Michael Palin
quote: Contrary to what the politicians and religious leaders would like us to believe, the world won't be made safer by creating barriers between people.

author: Swami Vivekananda
quote: The highest truth is this: God is present in all beings.
